medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports intermittent nausea for a few months, which became more severe 1 week ago. She developed sharp abdominal pain in the right upper quadrant radiation to the back, along with vomiting last week and alternating diarrhea and constipation. Patient began to take less by mouth prior to presenting.
medical_history.family_history: Grandmother with diabetes mellitus, father with heart problems that resolved after lifestyle changes.
